nav.icons_text: Change icons and change their style

icon_settings.title: Icon Settings
icon_settings.key_text: Where can I find kit code? Free version also requires registration. You have to generate a set, and in the set code you will find a 10-digit set key. If you already have a set, select it and copy its key.

icon_import.title: Icons Import
icon_import.about: Enter here the imported icons in the form of JSON.
icon_import.not_json: The content must be a valid JSON string.

icon_export.title: Icons Export
icon_export.copy_error: The content has not been copied.

icons.about_icons_text: Here you can change the current forum icons to whatever you want! Search for the icon on the forum you would like to change (original icon), enter the path leading to it (path element) and select a new icon (modified icon). All icons are a package of Font Awesome icons.
icons.key_error: Kit code are not found, or are incorrect. Check your icons settings and change it! After saving the changes, refresh the page.
